name: ノイズ
message: "Let go."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh shut up. Move your legs, not your mouth! Move!"
I drag Noiz out of the room and toward the stairs.
But just as we reach the top of the staircase―

name: チンピラＡ
message: "Hey, assholes!"

name: チンピラＢ
message: "We know you're here! Get your asses out where we can see 'em!"
The door bursts open with a splintering of wood, then several men barge in.
...Wait. Are these the same guys Noiz was fighting yesterday?

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess I should say I told you so."

name: ノイズ
message: "Who are they?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "The guys you punched out yesterday."

name: ノイズ
message: "Huh. They don't know when to quit."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's what I said..."
Trying to stay out of sight, I peer over the railing into the lobby.

name: ノイズ
message: "We going down?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "They'll just grab us if we do. We should try to take 'em by surprise or something."

name: ノイズ
message: "...Yeah."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm gonna need your help. Okay... Go!"
We dash down the stairs together.
A few steps from the bottom, I grab the handrail and launch myself forward.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uryah!"

name: チンピラＡ
message: "Gaah?!"
I slam my knee into the face of the guy at the front of the group. He falls on his back, pinning one of his men under him.

name: チンピラＢ
message: "Ngh! Motherfucker!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hah!"
Just as I'm about to kick the guy charging me, Noiz jumps in and knocks him out with one brass-knuckled punch.

name: チンピラＢ
message: "Ugh!"

name: ノイズ
message: "What a pain in the ass. Let's get outta here already."

name: 蒼葉
message: "This is all your fault, you know!"
Anyway, first things first!
Working together, we start to carve an escape route.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Orrryah!"

name: チンピラＣ
message: "Geh! Shit...!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Tch."
But before we've made much progress, we hear sirens and loud footsteps approaching.

name: 警官Ａ
message: "Hey! What are you doing?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Goddammit! Noiz, let's get out of here!"

name: チンピラＣ
message: "Get back here!"
We charge past the gangsters―they don't know when to quit!―and dash out the front door.
